info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Social API project

get.description: Retrieve a list of all comments with associated profiles and posts.

post.description: Create a new comment for a specific post and profile.

post_id.description: Post ID the comment belongs to

post.description: Allows a user to follow another user.

follower_id.description: ID of the profile following the other user

followed_id.description: ID of the profile being followed

delete.description: Allows a user to unfollow another user.

follower_id.description: ID of the profile unfollowing the other user

followed_id.description: ID of the profile being unfollowed

post.summary: Create a like for a post
post.description: Allows a user to like a specific post.

post_id.description: ID of the post to like

profile_id.description: ID of the profile liking the post
Profile ID that liked the post

delete.summary: Remove a like from a post
delete.description: Allows a user to remove their like from a specific post.

post_id.description: ID of the post to unlike

profile_id.description: ID of the profile removing the like

get.description: Retrieve a list of all posts.

post.description: Create a new post with content, an optional image, and link it to a profile.

profile_id.description: Profile ID associated with the post

get.description: Retrieve a list of all user profiles.

post.description: Create a new user profile with username, email, password, and profile picture.
Create a new user account with name, email, and password.
Authenticate the user with email and password and return an authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve a specific comment by ID, including the profile and post.

put.description: Update a comment's content by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a specific post by ID.

put.description: Update a post by ID, including content and optionally an image.

get.description: Retrieve a specific user profile by ID.

put.description: Update an existing profile with new data.

delete.description: Delete a user profile by ID.
